text: TTTHTf xrfearut 3r4 / Phone: 91-11-25074100/25074200 #Trdflm 714u #4 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 (T 4ra87, 134 4a87 &r ToTarf 47T74) IExtn:: 2223 2318 2468 2553 Q MT J#7 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry ol Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) 6ft-5 Ta 6, #zr-10, ErT, 7f frrit-11O 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 22nd 2008 No. 11041/217/2007-Admn POLICY MATTERS ~ ADMINISTRATION ENANCE (34/2008) [Decision taken on File No. NHATTech MMCAMMG/2007] Subject Model RFQ The Model RFQ issued by Ministry of Finance vide OM No 24QLPF-I/OZ dated 05/1212007 (revised on 01/05/2008) has been standardized for PPP project of NHAI A of the same is enclosed. The same henceforth be used for all the PPP projects of copy NHAI 2 Vox (VK: Sharma) General Manager (Admn:) To, AII Members ii) AII CGMs iii) AII GMs MHAL May,
